<NEW>

At this point, WHEELIE had two choices.  He could approach what see=
med to be GRIMLOCK coming along with whatever else, and announce his presen=
ce.  But this would risk that GRIMLOCK was not in his right frame of proces=
sor, that his friend had been reprogrammed or otherwise was with PREDACONS =
or other escorts who would be hostile to him anyways.  And yet if he hid an=
d GRIMLOCK noticed him, any chance he had of approaching in friendship woul=
d be nullified if he took hostile actions, and by the DINOBOT standards, st=
retched as they were by whatever had made them attack other MAXIMALS as he =
had been told..

Steeling himself, WHEELIE decided that the least he could =
do was put himself at risk in the same way the DINOBOTS had always done so =
for him.

Putting a 'dead' charge in his slingshot, and firing it up and in=
to the sky over like a flare to announce his presence then, the charge empt=
y of energy and only visible in teht hick fauna for a few hundred meters, a=
nd with no pulse of power to signify as an attack..

Walking out then, hold=
ing his weapon at half mast then to show he did not mean any hostiles, he c=
alled out< "Me Wheelie meet Him Grimlock.  Me Wheelie remember and call him=
 Grimlock Friend."
